metadata.title: CVE-2022-31212 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in dbus-broker before 31. It depends onc-uitl/c-shquote to parse the DBus service's Exec line. c-shquote containsa stack-based buffer over-read if a malicious Exec line is supplied.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31212` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dbus-broker - 32-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dbus-broker package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '32-1').
